title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump Is Seen Bypassing Acting FTC Chief
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump Is Seen Bypassing Acting FTC Chief
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: David McLaughlin Department of Justice Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing President Donald Trump poised to nominate a longtime antitrust attorney as chairman of the Federal Trade Commission, bypassing its acting Republican leader in favor of an outside candidate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
